text: The League of Ireland Premier Division is a football league which is the top division in the Republic of Ireland. For historic reasons, one club based in Northern Ireland, namely Derry City, plays in the Republic's league system, and is currently in the Premier Division. ==2023 clubs== *University College Dublin *Shamrock Rovers *Derry City *St Patrick's Athletic *Sligo Rovers *Dundalk *Bohemians Dublin *Shelbourne *Cork City *Drogheda United Category:Football League of Ireland
title: League of Ireland Premier Division
